property.name: Traits
property.value: Lord. King. Ironborn.

property.name: Text
property.value: If Balon Greyjoy is the only King character in play, characters with lower STR than his cannot be declared as defenders while he is attacking.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lady. Ironborn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Asha Greyjoy cannot be saved.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lord. Ironborn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Pay 1 gold to choose and kneel a location (limit once per round).

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lord. Ironborn.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Euron Crow's Eye is standing, Greyjoy characters you control gain stealth.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Immune to events.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lord. Ironborn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you reveal a plot card, Victarion Greyjoy claims 1 power if you control a Warship location. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lord. Ironborn.

property.name: Text
property.value: If Aeron Damphair would be killed, instead search your deck for a non-unique Holy character with cost 3 or lower, put it into play, shuffle your deck and put Aeron Damphair on the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: Kneel Maester Wendamyr to save a Greyjoy character from being killed or discarded. Then, you may kneel 2 influence or kneel a Learned character to stand that character.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Ally. Ironborn.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Wex Pyke is attacking, characters without crests cannot be declared as defenders.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Army. Ironborn.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Limited. No attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kneel Stowaway and discard the top card of your deck to choose an Ironborn character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains an Intrigue icon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Discard the top card of your deck to give a Holy character +1 STR until the end of the phase. (Limit twice per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: During a challenge in which you are the attacker, kneel Drumbeater to have that challenge considered unopposed if you win by 4 or more total STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: If Drowned Disciple would be killed, instead put it on the bottom of your deck. Then, each opponent discards the top 3 cards of his or her deck.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lord. Ironborn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Warship location you control counts as 2 STR during the dominance phase.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Army. Ironborn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: You may put Ten Towers Honor Guard into play from your hand, under the control of any opponent. After that opponent wins a challenge in which Ten Towers Honor Guard participated, take control of Ten Towers Honor Guard.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Greyjoy only. No attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After an opponent plays an attachment card, discard Scurvy Cutthroat from play (cannot be saved) to discard that attachment from play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win an unopposed challenge, you may initiate an additional challenge of the same type this phase (this additional challenge must be the next challenge you initiate). If that additional challenge is opposed, neither player wins the challenge.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Greyjoy only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win dominance, kneel 2 standing Ironborn characters to choose and stand a Greyjoy Lord or Lady character. Then, that character claims 2 power and you draw 2 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: Cancel a triggered effect unless its controller kneels 1 influence.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Greyjoy only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: Save a Greyjoy character from being killed. Then attach this card to the saved character (counts as a Condition attachment with the text ';Attached character gets +1 STR.';)

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gains stealth. Response: After you win an unopposed challenge, stand attached character.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Greyjoy character only.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Skill. Condition.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gains Stealth. Response: After you win an unopposed challenge in which attached character participated, attach Veteran Marauder to an opponent's location. Treat that location as if its printed text box were blank while Veteran Marauder is attached.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Iron Islands.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: Kneel Iron Island Fiefdoms to lower the cost of the next Greyjoy card you play this phase by 1.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Iron Islands.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may choose to play Aeron's Chambers as an attachment to your House card.

property.name: House
property.value: Lannister. Greyjoy.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: Discard Sunset Sea from play to reduce the cost of the next HL or Greyjoy character you play this phase by 2.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Iron Islands.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: Kneel to lower the cost of the next Greyjoy character you play this phase by 2.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Iron Islands.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: Kneel and discard from play (cannot be saved) to save a character from being killed.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the end of the Marshalling phase, kneel each Warship location you control if you do not control a Greyjoy character. Challenges: Kneel Longship Iron Victory to choose a participating character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +2 STR. If you win the challenge, draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kneel Scouting Vessel to choose a defending character. For the duration of the challenge, that character does not count its STR.

property.name: House
property.value: Stark. Lannister. Baratheon. Greyjoy. Martell. Targaryen.

property.name: Text
property.value: After a player wins initiative, that player kneels all cards named Bay of Ice, then draws a card.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Iron Islands.

property.name: House
property.value: Stark. Lannister. Baratheon. Greyjoy. Martell. Targaryen.

property.name: Text
property.value: After a player wins an Intrigue challenge, that player kneels all copies of Kingdom of Shadows to choose and stand a card with the Shadow crest.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lord. King.

property.name: Text
property.value: If Robb Stark is the only King character in play, he gains: ';Any Phase: Kneel Robb Stark to reduce the cost of the next HS army you play this phase to 0.';

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lord. King.

property.name: Text
property.value: If Joffrey Baratheon is the only King character in play, he gets +1 STR for each gold token on him. Response: After an opponent pays gold to marshall a character, put that gold on Joffrey Baratheon. (Limit once per round.)

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lord. King.

property.name: Text
property.value: If Robert Baratheon is the only King character in play, he gains: ';Any Phase: Kneel Robert Baratheon to play an ';Any Phase'; event card from your discard pile as if you just played it from your hand. Then, shuffle that event card back into your deck.';

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lord. King.

property.name: Text
property.value: If Viserys Targaryen is the only King character in play, he gains: ';Each attachment on Viserys Targaryen reduces the amount of power you need to win the game by 1.';

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lady. Queen.

property.name: Text
property.value: If Myrcella Lannister is the only Queen character in play, she gains: ';Any Phase: Kneel Myrcella Lannister to choose a Knight character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains an Intrigue icon and stealth.';

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a Military challenge in which you control at least 1 attacking War character, choose and discard from play up to 2 non-limited locations controlled by the losing opponent. (Limit 1 per round.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Kneel 3 influence or kneel a Holy character to look at an opponent's hand. Then, discard 1 non-limited card from that hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kneel attached character to choose a participating character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +2 STR. (Limit once per phase.) Challenges: Kneel Seafarer's Bow to choose a participating character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +2 STR. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win an unopposed challenge, kneel 4 influence or kneel a War character to claim 3 power for your House. (Limit 1 per phase.)

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Greyjoy only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: Discard Shivering Sea from play to reduce the cost of the next neutral character you play this phase by 1.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Stealth. No attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value: Silent Sisters gets +1 STR for each character in your dead pile.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lord. House Tarly.

property.name: Text
property.value: War characters you control get +1 STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Kneel 1 influence to give Jack of All Trades (choose one) a War , a Noble , a Learned , or a Holy crest until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a challenge in which Godswood Attendant participated, look at the top card of any player's deck. Then, you may discard that card or put it back on top of its owner's deck.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Military Battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each player may initiate an additional Military challenge this round.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Military Battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: You cannot declare Intrigue challenges.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Intrigue Gambit.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each player may initiate an additional Intrigue challenge this round.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Intrigue Gambit.

property.name: Text
property.value: After you win an Intrigue challenge, you may put all cards in your hand on the bottom of your deck and replace them with an equal number of cards from the top of your deck.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Power Struggle.

property.name: Text
property.value: If a King or Queen character would be killed, instead return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Power Struggle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each player may initiate an additional Power challenge this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: You claim an additional power for winning unopposed challenges.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Greyjoy only.

property.name: Text
property.value: After an opponent wins a Military challenge against you, that opponent takes control of Commander of the Iron Fleet.

property.name: Text
property.value:
After you win an unopposed challenge, claim 1 additional power for your House.
After an opponent wins an unopposed challenge against you, that opponent takes control of The Crow's Eye.

property.name: Text
property.value: After an opponent wins a Power challenge against you, that opponent takes control of Lord of the Isles.

property.name: Text
property.value:
If you win initiative, take 2 gold from the treasury and add it to your gold pool.
If an opponent wins initiative, that opponent takes control of Pirate Marauder.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Each gold in your gold pool counts as two STR during the dominance phase.
If an opponent wins dominance, that opponent takes control of Priest of the Drowned God.

property.name: Text
property.value: After an opponent wins an Intrigue challenge against you, that opponent takes control of The Reader.
